mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name,room, begin_date, end_date, master_id ,subject) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject})
mapper.update: update clazz set name = #{name}, room = #{room}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, master_id = #{masterId}, subject = #{subject}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select c.*, -- 查班级表所有基础信息 e.name as masterName, -- 1. 联查：把 emp 表的名字拿过来，起个别名叫 masterName
-- 2. 状态计算逻辑 (CASE WHEN) case when now() > c.end_date then '已结课' when now() < c.begin_date then '未开班' -- 注意：XML里 小于号要写成 < else '在读中' end as status
from clazz c left join emp e on c.master_id = e.id -- 左外连接：即使没有班主任，班级也能查出来
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and c.begin_date >= #{begin}
and c.end_date <= #{end}
order by c.create_time desc
select * from clazz order by create_time desc
